<h3 id="X11684">X(11684)&nbsp;=&nbsp;PERSPECTOR OF THESE TRIANGLES: INNER-CONWAY AND OUTER-GARCIA</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3+2*(b+c)*a^2-(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a-(b+c)*(2*b^2-b*c+2*c^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11684) = 2*X(1)-3*X(21) = 2*X(10)-X(79)</b>
<p>X(11684) lies on these lines:{1,21}, {2,3649}, {8,30}, {10,79}, {35,4067}, {40,3681}, {46,3876}, {65,3219}, {72,74}, {144,1654}, {145,4831}, {165,3984}, {323,8614}, {329,442}, {404,5692}, {411,5693}, {484,3678}, {516,5178}, {517,3652}, {519,5441}, {524,4918}, {908,3634}, {936,9352}, {942,5284}, {956,8148}, {960,3218}, {1043,4427}, {1125,4880}, {1156,6598}, {1191,4392}, {1320,5288}, {1698,6701}, {1757,4642}, {1761,2173}, {1778,4016}, {2306,5362}, {2802,3065}, {2895,3704}, {3245,3626}, {3303,4430}, {3305,3339}, {3336,10176}, {3701,4756}, {3833,5506}, {3841,11552}, {3871,5904}, {3913,4661}, {3916,4511}, {3924,7262}, {3962,4640}, {4047,5279}, {4084,5251}, {4324,9963}, {4662,5183}, {4860,11281}, {4861,11278}, {4867,5267}, {5044,9342}, {5047,5902}, {5057,6734}, {5289,5427}, {5428,5730}, {5535,6915}, {5550,5708}, {5657,10942}, {5694,6905}, {5705,10129}, {5710,7226}, {5884,6986}, {6841,11415}, {7701,11525}, {10707,10916}</p>
<p>
X(11684) = midpoint of X(8) and X(3648)<br>
X(11684) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1,3647), (21,191), (79,10), (145,10543), (3648,3650)<br>
X(11684) = anticomplement of X(3649)<br>
X(11684) = X(54)-of-inner-Conway-triangle<br>
X(11684) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,191,3647), (1,3647,21), (10,79,6175), (40,3951,3681), (63,3869,2975), (65,3219,5260), (72,3579,4420), (191,6763,1749), (960,3218,5253), (1046,2292,81), (1749,3878,21), (1761,3958,2287), (3579,4420,100), (3648,3650,10032), (3899,8666,5330), (3916,4511,5303)<br>
</p>
